sentences.en: New Jersey Governor John Corzine appointed Singh to the post of ratepayer advocate, representing New Jersey consumers of services such as energy and water.
sentences.cn: 新泽西州长约翰·科尔津(John Corzine)任命辛格担任维护纳税人权益的职务，代表新泽西能源和用水等服务行业的消费者。

words.tran_cn: 按比例的；可估价的；应纳税的（等于ratable）

trans.tran_en: someone who pays taxes that are used to provide local services
